songs.title: It’s True Love
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1: Brendon Urie]
True love is scarce
As crossed as prickles and thorns
On juniper trees
True love is rare
My sweetie, falling in love is ours
I still believe

[Chorus]
True love
Is it a fairy tale?
Love isn't make-believe
True love like ours
Is worth so much more than a diamond ring
True love
Is it a fairy tale?
Love isn't make-believe
True love like ours
Is worth so much more than a diamond ring

[Verse 2: Brendon Urie and Ryan Ross]
True love's old fashioned
True love is antique
Love is established philosophy
(Lalala)
True love is much more scarce than money
Love in our pockets, we'll never go hungry
In separate ways
And everyone says

[Chorus]
True love
Is it a fairy tale?
Love isn't make-believe
True love like ours
Is worth so much more than a diamond ring
True love
Is it a fairy tale?
Love isn't make-believe
True love like ours
Is worth so much more than a diamond ring

[Chorus]
True love
Is it a fairy tale?
Love isn't make-believe
True love like ours
Is worth so much more than a diamond ring
True love
Is it a fairy tale?
Love isn't make-believe
True love like ours
Is worth so much more than a diamond ring

[Chorus]
True love
Is it a fairy tale?
Love isn't make-believe
True love like ours
Is worth so much more than a diamond ring
Than diamond rings
